name: Dream Island-Solitaire Game
description:
Dream Island, a new free-to-play challenging puzzle solitaire games, has finally arrived! Wilson and Lori will transform and renovate an entire island with many amazing stories being told. At the same time, you can enjoy a classic card games, exercise your brain and become smarter.

Game features：
-Build and Renovate: Create the island of your dream!
-Classic Card Game: Kill the boring time while keeping your mind sharp!
-Interesting Stories: With a unique and fun storyline, this game will keep you interested in the long and short term.
-Dress Ups: The characters no longer need to wear the same boring outfits, mix and match the way you want!
-Cute Pets: Whether you like dogs or cats, this game has all the cute pets you love!

Lori and Wilson meets in a villa on Dream Island. Being two complete strangers, why did they decide to live together? And Why did they start renovating the island? And what happens to their relationship over time? The answers are waiting for you in Dream Island. So download the game and enjoy!

Dream Island is a free-to-play solitaire game with in-app purchases for a more exciting experience. We hope the items you purchased can help you in the most crucial time!
